000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;34       char *s = *ps;
000002  6813              LDR      r3,[r2,#0]
;;;35     #if GUI_DEBUG_LEVEL >1
;;;36       if (Len > 32) {
;;;37         GUI_DEBUG_WARN("Can not display more than 32 bin. digits");
;;;38         Len = 32;
;;;39       }
;;;40     #endif
;;;41       (*ps) += Len;
000004  6814              LDR      r4,[r2,#0]
000006  440c              ADD      r4,r4,r1
000008  6014              STR      r4,[r2,#0]
;;;42       **ps   = '\0';     /* Make sure string is 0-terminated */
00000a  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
00000c  6815              LDR      r5,[r2,#0]
00000e  702c              STRB     r4,[r5,#0]
;;;43       while(Len--) {
000010  e004              B        |L1.28|
                  |L1.18|
;;;44         *(s + Len) = (char)('0' + (v & 1));
000012  f0000401          AND      r4,r0,#1
000016  3430              ADDS     r4,r4,#0x30
000018  545c              STRB     r4,[r3,r1]
;;;45         v >>= 1;
00001a  0840              LSRS     r0,r0,#1
                  |L1.28|
00001c  000c              MOVS     r4,r1                 ;43
00001e  f1a10501          SUB      r5,r1,#1              ;43
000022  b2e9              UXTB     r1,r5                 ;43
000024  d1f5              BNE      |L1.18|
;;;46       }
;;;47     }
000026  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
